column2: "<%me>, hello. Are you also getting involved in the violent dragon case?"
"It's really a troublesome incident. If you get involved, I can't guarantee your safety."
"Plus right when Dark Falz [Elder] has returned, it's really not the time to have to look into things like this."
"I guess it doesn't matter which time period it is, researchers tend to make things that get out of hand."
"I don't mean to sound like I'm complaining. Anyways, I'm going to get back to my mission."
